import "./intro.scss" import { init } from 'ityped' import { useEffect, useRef } from "react" export default function Intro() { const textRef = useRef(); useEffect(()=>{ init(textRef.current, { showCursor: false, strings: ['Lawyer', 'Judge' ], }) },[]) return (

Introduction to,

Thoroughgood(Thurgood) Marshall

) }
